title: Fundamentals of Electric Bus Battery State Prediction Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of electric bus systems and introductory statistical analysis
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, focusing on conceptual understanding and practical application skills rather than complex mathematical modeling

learning_goals: Can explain key factors in predicting electric bus battery status (state of charge, drivable distance)
Can understand the multi-task learning framework of the LSTM-Transformer hybrid model
Can explain step-by-step procedures for implementing predictive models using vehicle, battery, and weather data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
